QuestData.Title: In Need of a Hero
QuestData.Description: I...<sob>... I can't leave...<gulp>... without... Squiggy...!$B$BHe... he's... trapped!$B$BYou need... to put out... the fire!$B$B<Ariaana points across the room and bursts into tears.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Save Squiggy by dousing fires with buckets of water.
QuestData.RewardText: You did it! Squiggy is okay!
